title: Nana Maru San Batsu
original_name: ナナマル サンバツ
sinopse:
As soon as he entered high school, the first year student Koshiyama Shiki was invited to the mysterious Quiz Study Group led by his senpai. What will Shiki run into when being dragged along by his classmate Mari into the dazzling world of competitive quizzes?!

(Source: ComicWalker)
